articles.description: The all-new Renault Kiger was unveiled yesterday, and at the event the French automaker also showcased a fully accessorized version of the sub-4 meter compact SUV. The Kiger shares its underpinnings with the Nissan Magnite, and also shares the latter’s engine…

articles.title: Randeep Hothi: The Indian American who sued Elon Musk - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Randeep Hothi is a 2009 graduate of University of California, Berkeley. Hes part of a global group that has vehemently criticised Elon Musk and Tesla. This group made up of ex-Tesla employees, students like Hothi, and other professionals.
articles.content: In a surprising reversal of fortune, millionaire Elon Musk failed to stop a defamation lawsuit filed by Indian American graduate student Randeep Hothi. Hothi is a stringent critic of Musk and Tesla a… [+2516 chars]
